content: You’re about to make an investment in the area of several hundreds of thousands of dollars. I would expect more specific questions and a hell of a lot longer than a single 30 minute interview. I would expect exposure to your team and a trial period of working with them…..that or at least a round of interviews with your team. You’re looking for someone to deliver you a baby of revenue. Three questions and a 30 minute interview will barely touch on that. It certainly won’t reveal a unicorn. Unicorns emerge their greatness through a culture.
